ovdesc.p: New application used for reversal of safekeeping fees and will be build on reversal of SAFEKEEP.HOLDING.POSTED.
Safekeeping fees can be reversed by authorising the record in this application.

desc.p: Identifies the Exchange Rate between the Tax Amount and the Local Currency.
Noinput field.
Identifies the system calculated Advisory Charge in Local Currency, for this portfolio.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Tax applied to the Advisory Charge.
Noinput field.
Identifies the resultant Customer Advisory Charge.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Charge Code or Group to be used for Advisory Charges.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Tax applied to the Advisory Charge in Local Currency.
Noinput field.
Identifies the End Period of the Advisory Charge.
Noinput field.
Date for reversal of management fees. This field will be updated on reversal of SAFEKEEP.HOLDING.POSTED record.
Standard T24 date field.
Contains all the Override messages which the user agreed to during Input.
In the event that the user confirms the Override, the full text of the actual Override Message will be stored, for reference purposes only, in this multivalue field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Date for posting of management fees.
Standard T24 date field.
No input field.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Indentifies the Period of the Advisory Charge in Months.
Noinput field.
This field contains the customer number for which fees are being reversed.
Its a noinput field.
Identifies the Tax Code used in the calculation of the Tax Amount.
Noinput Field.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 20 characters may be entered.
This is a no input, no copy field.
Id will be portfolio number and year month separated by a dot(.)
Identifies the Start of the Charge Period for Advisory Charges.
Noinput field.
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
Identifies the Currency of the Account to be used to reverse Advisory Charges.
Noinput field.
Identifies the Customer Account to be used to reverse Advisory Charges.
No input field.

System-maintained field populated only when SAFECUSTODY.VALUES>PERFORM.ACCRUAL is set to DAILY. Recorded to support the reversal of accounting entries following fee reversal after the fee-realisation date.
Identifies the Exchange Rate between : Account Currency and Local Currency.
Noinput field.
